name: Dice Fun
description:
If you are looking for the ideal puzzle game,then this dice puzzle game is one of the best games for you.

Come and try this perfect puzzle dice game, it can train your brain while playing.
Isn't this the best merge game?
Random dice games and number merging are easy to play, very addictive, and provide brain-enhancing challenges!

Challenge how to combine random dice games and numbers together!

You can rotate the dice on the plate to match three or more random dice with the same number horizontally or vertically, and then merge the dice!
When you merge the exploding dice,it will help you clear the dice and get a higher score!
Once there is no room for new dice,the game will end.

Features:
- No time limit,free play?
- Exquisite style.
- Fun and addictive.
- Enhance thinking skills.

The game is very simple,but still requires strategic challenges.
Train your brain while killing time!
